name: Delegation
description:
A simple minigame (or 6), made to practice using delegates in Unity. Either do the minigames yourself, or delegate to the AI for half points...

The minigames (left to right):

Q: Press Q when the numbers match

W: Press W to inflate

E: Keep the bar within the bounds, or your points will drain. Press E to fill

R: Press R when the blocks overlap

T (Bottom left): Solve the sum! Press T to increase your answer

Y (Bottom right): Don't let the bomb explode! If the bomb is orange, press Y to defuse it, if you don't it'll turn red and explode after a few seconds. If you try to defuse the bomb when it is blue, it'll explode, so be careful!

See how many points you can get, and how much delegation that involves!
